topic.title: Church Video shows gunman open fire at West Freeway Church of Christ in White Settlement, Texas

congratulations to the heroes who were armed and avoided a greater evil. For the bandit could have killed more people: /, if there were no armed people to defend the place.
========================================
parabéns aos herois que estavam armados e evitaram um mal maior. Pois o bandido, poderia ter matado mais gente :/, se não houvessem pessoas armadas para fazer a defesa do lugar.

1577574820_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_50_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): if you live in NZ then you just dont click to seed that video, i dont see why it had to be removed. I thought Zeronet was supposed to be beyond this kind of thing.

use Big Kopy Kate 2 because here who will moderate are the users themselves and ALL, will have TOTAL freedom and as far as I know, NOTHING will be blocked or deleted.

From what I know here (Big Kopy Kate 2), everyone will have to block the user / channel that is bothering him.

For from what I saw the dev said he will follow the principle that there is NO half freedom.

I didn't like the attitude of the kopykate owner, but the site is HER, she does whatever she wants, welcome back.

My videos I'll just post on Big Kopy Kate 2, but thank you for your work and live the freedom :)

==================================================

original pt-br

use o Big Kopy Kate 2 pois aqui quem vai moderar são os próprios usuários e TODOS, vão ter TOTAL liberdade e até onde sei, NADA vai ser bloqueado ou deletado.

Pelo que sei aqui (Big Kopy Kate 2) , cada um vai ter que bloquear o usuário/canal que estiver lhe incomodando.

Pois pelo que vi o dev disse que vai seguir o principio de que NÃO EXISTE meia liberdade.

Não gostei da atitude da dona do kopykate, mas o site É DELA, ela faz o que quiser, seja bem vinda de volta.

Os meus videos eu só vou postar no Big Kopy Kate 2, mas agradeço pelo seu trabalho e viva a liberdade :)


http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Latest
